mapper.select: SELECT asb.assemble_id AS assemble_id, asb.platform_id AS platform_id, asb.domain_id AS domain_id, asb.tag AS tag, asb.status AS status FROM assemble asb where asb.assemble_id=#{assembleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into assemble(platform_id, domain_id, tag, status) values (#{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
